summary: A documentary examination of the accusations of sexual misconduct against the Duke University lacrosse team that were ultimately found to be baseless
cast: Joe Alleva|Bradley Bannon|Bill Bell|Richard H. Brodhead|Jackie Brown|Delois Burnette|William Chafe|Joe Cheshire|James E. Coleman|Jim Coman|Jim Cooney|Roy Cooper|Shawn Cunningham|Tricia Dowd|Dave Evans|Kevin Finnerty|Jesse Jackson|Robert David Johnson|Tara Levicy|Crystal Mangum|Tony McDevitt|Ryan McFadyen|Susannah Meadows|Brian Meehan|Joseph Neff|Mike Nifong|Daniel Okrent|Mike Pressler|Kathy Seligmann|Ruth Sheehan|Wade Smith|Kerry Sutton|Rob Wellington|Don Yaeger|Marina Zenovich
title: Fantastic Lies
